title: Ban before any chat restrictions?
body: Never gotten a chat restriction and went straight into having a 14 day ban. Whatâ€™s up with that?

replies.body: We can't lift bans like this here in Help & Support, but I did go ahead and check into what happened to see if I could give any context on why it happened. It does look like that chat went rather over the line, but if you don't remember or need more context you can hit up the player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Only support would be able to tell you the answer to this without you posting the logs for which you were banned. If you don't know the reason, you could make a support ticket.
